review: We are very happy with doctors diagnosis skills. He knows what he does and happy to see him again. Thanks

The doctor timing mentioned is 10.00AM to 3.00PM. Actually the timing is only for 1 hour i.e. from 1.30PM to 2.30 PM what I have been told, but actually doctor didn't report till 2.30 PM. Request all higher personnel to look into the issue for betterment of the common public.
